allowance(address,address,uint8).details: Checks if there is a valid grant from granter to grantee for specified message type

params.grantee: The account address which has the Authorization.
params.granter: The account address that grants an Authorization.
params.method: The message type URL of the methods for which the approval should be queried.

returns.allowed: Boolean value to indicatie if the grant exists and is not expired

approve(address,(uint8,(uint256,string)[.details: Approves a list of Cosmos messages.

params.authorizations: The list of authorizations to grant to the grantee.
params.grantee: The account address which will be authorized to spend the origin's funds.

returns.approved: Boolean value to indicate if the approval was successful.

batchCancelDerivativeOrders(address,(str.details: cancel a batch of derivative orders

params.data: The data of the orders to cancel

batchCancelSpotOrders(address,(string,st.details: cancel a batch of spot orders

params.data: The data of the orders to cancel

batchCreateDerivativeLimitOrders(address.details: create a batch of derivative limit orders

batchCreateSpotLimitOrders(address,(stri.details: create a batch of spot limit orders

params.marketID: The market the order is in
params.orderMask: The order mask (use default 0 if you don't know what this is)
params.subaccountID: The subaccount that placed the order

returns.success: Whether the order was successfully cancelled

params.marketID: The market the order is in
params.subaccountID: The subaccount that created the order

returns.success: Whether the order was successfully cancelled

params.order: The derivative order to create (cf. DerivativeOrder)
The spot order to create (cf. SpotOrder)

decreasePositionMargin(address,string,st.details: defines a request to decrease the margin of a position

params.amount: The amount by which to decrease the position margin
params.destinationSubaccountID: The subaccount to send balance to
params.marketID: The market where position is in
params.sourceSubaccountID: The subaccount that owns the position

returns.success: Whether the operation succeeded or not

deposit(address,string,string,uint256).details: Transfers coins from the sender's bank balance into the subaccount's exchange deposit. This will increase both the AvailableBalance and the TotalBalance of the subaccount's deposit by the provided amount.

params.amount: The amount of coins to deposit
params.denom: The denomination of the coin to deposit
params.sender: The address of the sender, where the funds will come from
params.subaccountID: (optional) The ID of the subaccount to deposit funds into. If empty, the coins will be deposited into the sender's default subaccount

returns.success: Whether the transaction was successful or not

derivativeOrdersByHashes((string,string,.details: retrieves a trader's derivative orders by market ID, subaccount ID, and order hashes

externalTransfer(address,string,string,s.details: Transfers funds from one of the sender's subaccounts to an external subaccount, not necessarily owned by the sender

params.amount: The amount of coins to transfer
params.denom: The denomination of coins to transfer
params.destinationSubaccountID: The ID of the destination subaccount
params.sourceSubaccountID: The ID of the originating subaccount

returns.success: Whether the transaction was a success or not

increasePositionMargin(address,string,st.details: increase the margin of a position

params.amount: The amount by which to increase the position margin
params.destinationSubaccountID: The subaccount that owns the position
params.marketID: The market where position is in
params.sourceSubaccountID: The subaccount to send balance from

returns.success: Whether the operation succeeded or not

revoke(address,uint8[]).details: Revokes a list of Cosmos messages.

params.grantee: The account address which will have its allowances revoked.
params.methods: The message type URLs of the methods to revoke.

returns.revoked: Boolean value to indicate if the revocation was successful.

spotOrdersByHashes((string,string,string.details: retrieves a trader's spot orders by market ID, subaccount ID, and order hashes

subaccountDeposit(string,string).details: Queries a subaccount's deposits for a given denomination

returns.availableBalance: The available balance of the deposit
returns.totalBalance: The total balance of the deposit

subaccountDeposits(string,string,uint32).details: Queries all the deposits of a subaccount

params.subaccountID: The ID of the subaccount if trader and subaccountNonce are empty
params.trader: The address of the subaccount owner

subaccountPositions(string).details: Queries all the derivative positions of a subaccount

subaccountTransfer(address,string,string.details: Transfers funds between two subaccounts owned by the sender

params.amount: The amount of coins to transfer
params.denom: The denomination of coins to transfer
params.destinationSubaccountID: The ID of the destination subaccount
params.sourceSubaccountID: The ID of the originating subaccount

returns.success: Whether the transaction was a success or not

withdraw(address,string,string,uint256).details: Withdraws from a subaccount's deposit to the sender's bank balance. This will decrement the subaccount's AvailableBalance and TotalBalance by the specified amount. Note that amount must be less than or equal to the deposit's AvailableBalance.

params.amount: The amount of coins to withdraw
params.denom: The denomination of coins to withdraw
params.sender: The address of the sender, where coins will be sent to
params.subaccountID: The ID of the subaccount to withdraw funds from. Note the ownership of the subaccount by sender will be verified.

returns.success: Whether the transaction was successful or not
